titleStmt.title: Be it knowne vnto all deuote and faythful people that there hath byne and is erectede foure hosspitals in and aboute the cytie of London ...
Proclamations. 1560-11-04
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

notesStmt.note: Brief for 21-year collections in Wales on behalf of hospitals in and about London and Oriel College, Oxford.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
